overview: There is great excitement at the W체rzburg TV station TV-Frankenwarte: Irmi Werner, the well-known host of the gossip talk show "MainGespr채ch" disappears after recording a program. Irmi, who is not only popular with the rich and beautiful of the Main-Franconian metropolis, is initially only missed by her son.  Soon after, body parts of her turn up scattered all over the city. Chief Inspector Rabe and his colleagues are faced with a mystery, because no body is found - is Irmi still alive in the end and being held mysteriously hostage?  But there are also other problems: Rabe's friend Strick has to make sure that his old nanny "Omma Z체rrlein" does not lose her apartment. She is being evicted from her apartment by a real estate shark who senses a lot of money in the construction of student apartments. Strick is actively supported by his old childhood buddy Laszlo "Schaschlik" Oberm체ller...
tagline: Rabe und Strick -  Back in Action!!!
title: Appearance of Reality
